ai-ja447:1.2_0: For what does the result is well?
ai-ja447:1.4_0: Why should I be you not shameless?”
ai-ja447:2.2_0: and because of wicked deeds he avoids wickedness.
ai-ja447:2.4_0: Therefore I’m not a youth, Missaka,
ai-ja447:3.1_0: listening to the teaching of the virtuous, and the wicked.
ai-ja447:3.2_0: No one is unattached to the Dhamma,
ai-ja447:3.3_0: Having abandoned terror, he should not be peaceful,
ai-ja447:3.4_0: Therefore I’m not a youth, Missaka,
ai-ja447:4.1_0: Formerly we used to give gifts,
ai-ja447:4.2_0: then our minds will also be delighted,
ai-ja447:4.3_0: The fool does not regret it later
ai-ja447:4.4_0: Therefore I’m not a youth, Missaka,
ai-ja447:5.2_0: and hair grey hair, and beggars
ai-ja447:5.3_0: being practised by food and drink,
ai-ja447:5.4_0: Therefore I’m not a youth, Missaka,
ai-ja447:6.2_0: and his wife though they were not looking!
ai-ja447:6.4_0: Therefore I’m not a youth, Missaka,
ai-ja447:7.1_0: Ill delight in killing living creatures.
ai-ja447:7.2_0: fine or coarse, beautiful or ugly:
ai-ja447:7.4_0: Therefore I’m not a youth, Missaka,
ai-ja447:8.4_0: Therefore I’m not a youth, Missaka,
ai-ja447:9.3_0: out of affection for the sake of others,
ai-ja447:9.4_0: Therefore I’m not a youth, Missaka,
ai-ja447:10.2_0: may all the deeds of the stream (of the gods).
ai-ja447:10.3_0: wander from the world of the other world,
ai-ja447:10.4_0: That’s why I don’t like a youth.”
ai-ja447:11.1_0: “Dhamma surely protects one who practices Dhamma;
ai-ja447:11.3_0: This is the benefit of practicing Dhamma:
ai-ja447:11.4_0: He who lives by the Dhamma does not go to a bad destination.
ai-ja447:12.1_0: The Dhamma protects the one who lives by the Dhamma,
ai-ja447:12.4_0: but it’s unshakable for you to take happiness.”
ai-ja447:13.1_0: was reborn in the Great Wood, the ninth Chapter.
